ch0170_40_arty/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
What do you think of this outfit?
ch0170_40_arty/0101_0701_02_10:
I designed it myself just for the occasion! What do
you think?
ch0170_40_arty/7101_0701_01_10:
Notice anything interesting about this outfit
I’m wearing?
ch0170_40_arty/7101_0701_02_10:
Why, I incorporated elements of Togepi and
Bug-type Pokémon into the design!
ch0170_40_arty/7101_0701_03_10: That makes it the perfect outfit for me!
ch0170_40_arty/7102_0701_02_10:
Did you know that Togepi is considered a symbol
of good luck?
ch0170_40_arty/7102_0701_03_10: Its shell is said to be filled with happiness.
ch0170_40_arty/7102_0701_04_10:
But when I tried to look inside my partner’s shell,
he got mad at me.
ch0170_40_arty/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m actually working on an original piece for
the egg-hunting event.
ch0170_40_arty/7103_0701_02_10:
Lots of sync pairs are expressing their passion for
art on these small eggs that fit in the palm of
your hand...
ch0170_40_arty/7103_0701_03_10:
You don’t see celebrations as unique as this
very often!
ch0170_40_arty/7103_0701_04_10: You’ll be joining the festivities, too, I presume?
ch0170_40_arty/7104_0701_01_10:
Have you decided how you’re going to decorate
your egg today?
ch0170_40_arty/7104_0701_02_10:
I have so much inspiration, I can’t decide which
idea to use!
ch0170_40_arty/7104_0701_03_10:
This is the kind of creative struggle that we artists
encounter...but it makes it all the more fun!
ch0170_40_arty/7105_0701_01_10:
These colorful egg decorations are bringing smiles
to all of the sync pairs who see them.
ch0170_40_arty/7105_0701_02_10:
It’s the same kind of passion we see you show
your Pokémon, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
It captivates those who see it.
ch0170_40_arty/7105_0701_03_10:
I’d love to make a piece of art that brings smiles
to everyone’s faces, too!
ch0170_40_arty/1701_0702_01_10: Here’s a festive present for you!
ch0170_40_arty/2501_0701_01_10:
Togepi’s my partner Pokémon, but that doesn’t
take away any of my love for Bug-type Pokémon.
ch0170_40_arty/2501_0701_02_10:
In fact, you could say that Bug-type Pokémon are
my life!
ch0170_40_arty/2501_0701_03_10: Do you have something like that, too?
ch0170_40_arty/2501_0702_01_10:
Bug-type Pokémon support me in my
artistic endeavors.
ch0170_40_arty/2501_0702_02_10:
The threads they produce are the perfect material,
and their colorful bodies inspire my creativity!
ch0170_40_arty/2501_0702_03_10:
Without Bug-type Pokémon, I might not have the
will to do anything.
ch0170_40_arty/2511_0701_01_10:
The goal of an egg hunt is to find and collect as
many hidden decorated eggs as you can. What a
unique event!
ch0170_40_arty/2511_0701_02_10:
Some people want to find more eggs than anyone
else, and others just want to enjoy the hunt more
than anyone else!
ch0170_40_arty/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s fascinating to see how different people
approach it.
ch0170_40_arty/2511_0702_01_10: What are your thoughts on joining an egg hunt?
ch0170_40_arty/2511_0702_02_10:
It’s fine to go with the crowd or forge your
own path.
ch0170_40_arty/2511_0702_03_10:
My only wish is for it to be an extraordinary
experience for you!
ch0170_40_arty/3001_0701_01_10:
Togepi’s shell is so beautiful, it inspires me to
create more masterpieces!
ch0170_40_arty/3003_0701_01_10:
Events are a stage where people gather and
stories are born!
ch0170_40_arty/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s fun to go to events at night, but I try not to
stay up too late.
